net.jodah.failsafe

Class ListenerConfig<S,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jodah.failsafe.ListenerConfig<S,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - source type
    R - result type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsyncListenerConfig, SyncFailsafe

    public class ListenerConfig<S,R>
extends Object
    Listener configuration.
